equipment.name: Crew Dragon
equipment.description: You can use the alternatives, but you might not get the crew back...

equipment.name: Cygnus
equipment.description: Really good for taking supplies to the ISS. We might've dropped it, but it should be fine. Right?

equipment.name: Hubble Space Telescope
equipment.description: It was meant to be a military spy telescope... but we found it in the back of the warehouse. Turn it the other way and it's surprisingly usefull
